issue.title: [C++][CI] The job labeled "AMD64 MacOS 10.15 C++" runs on MacOS 11.6.5
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16027](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16027). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The workflow is configured `runs-on: macos-latest` which is no longer 10.15

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16027?focusedCommentId=17512182) by Weston Pace (westonpace):*
I'm happy to fix this but not sure if we want to downgrade the runner to 10.15 or change the label to "MacOS Latest"
